InstructionData.Title: THST - Thermostat
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: # Dual Differential Thermostat (20C)​ # Model THST-DD20-100​ alias Sensor d0​ alias Cooler d1​ alias Cooler2 d2​ alias Heater d3​ alias Heater2 d4​ alias setpoint r0​ alias temperature r1​ alias differential r2​ alias maxtemp r3​ alias error r6​ alias heatOn r7​ alias coolOn r8​ alias t0 r10​ move setpoint 293.15​ move differential 1​ ​ justright:​ move heatOn 0​ move coolOn 0​ j1:​ l temperature d0 Temperature​ sub error setpoint temperature​ abs t0 error​ sle t0 t0 differential​ bgtz t0 ok​ bltz error toohot​ bgtz error toocold​ ok:​ jal process​ yield​ j j1​ ​ toohot:​ move heatOn 0​ move coolOn 1​ h1:​ l temperature d0 Temperature​ sle t0 temperature setpoint​ bgtz t0 justright​ jal process​ yield​ j h1​ ​ toocold:​ move heatOn 1​ move coolOn 0​ c1:​ l temperature d0 Temperature​ sge t0 temperature setpoint​ bgtz t0 justright​ jal process​ yield​ j c1​ ​ process:​ brdns Heater 3​ s Heater On heatOn​ s Heater2 On heatOn​ brdns Cooler 3​ s Cooler On coolOn​ s Cooler2 On coolOn​ j r17
